any.name: Any Card
any.rules: Choose any card of your deck.

jumping_slash.name: Jumping Slash
jumping_slash.rules: If this card is placed on the fifth slot of your stamina board, discard it.

enhanced_jumping_slash.rules: If this card is placed on the fifth slot of your stamina board, discard it.

overhead_slam.name: Overhead Slam
overhead_slam.rules: Draw +1 :damage: for each other Overhead Slam you played this turn.

enhanced_overhead_slam.name: Enhanced Overhead Slam

strong_charge_up.name: Strong Charge Up
strong_charge_up.rules: Playing this attack card doesn't count towards the maximum allowed by the :attacks:. Gain +2 :break: for the next attack card you play this turn which inflicts damage.

blazing_slam.rules: Draw +1 :damage: for each other Blazing Slam you played this turn.

At the start of your next turn, discard this card.
